## TocParameters.ignoreSelector property

Query selector(s) that match DOM elements to ignore Each selector is used as `:not(selector)`<!-- -->. Defaults to `.toc-exclude`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
ignoreSelector: string[] | string;
```
